name: Nam Thom
description: It's the most famous drink for a teenager in the southside of Thailand
directions: Bring the water to a boil and bring the prepared kratom leaves to wash thoroughly. When the kratom leaves are clean and crushed, put them into boiling water.
Boil for a period of approximately 30 minutes. When the time is up, then filter out the water. Then pour the sparkling water into it and stir to combine.
When everything is mixed well, set it aside to cool and fill a bottle. It can be stored in the refrigerator for 1 week. Drinking volume 250 ml / time (should not drink more than 2 times a day).
